product_name: Cute Cartoon Beaver Canada Flag Gradient Insulated Sports Water Bottles Double Walled Reusable Stainless Steel Water Bottles
description: Made of high-quality 304 stainless steel, this water bottle is extremely durable and lightweight, making it perfect for carrying around. The insulated water bottle's sealing design prevents drinks from spilling, making it easy to carry and suitable for outdoor activities such as camping and beaching. The insulation in this stainless steel water bottles keeps drinks cold for up to 48 hours or hot for up to 24 hours. So you can enjoy refreshment all day long. The metal water bottle is available in gradient blue and pink colors for you to choose from, and you can also design a cup with your own pattern. The sleek, modern design of this water bottle will look great on any bag. Our sports water bottle insulated opening is wide enough to accommodate most ice cubes so you can easily fill it and reuse it multiple times. Whether you're on the road, the bike trail, or the gym, you'll find it fits most standard-sized cup holders.
